scenes.description: Hakos Baelz performs a heartfelt rendition of 'Taiyou no Uta' while playing the acoustic guitar.
MC section where Baelz reflects on the importance of the previous song and introduces the next performance.
Baelz performs 'Ciki Ciki Bam Bam' with backup dancers in a vibrant stage setting.

subtitles.original: 限りある日々を 止まらない時間（とき）を
subtitles.english: In these finite days, throughout unstoppable time,

subtitles.original: どれだけ愛せるかな?
subtitles.english: How much can I love them?

subtitles.original: 愛せるよね 君がいれば
subtitles.english: I can love them, as long as you're here.

subtitles.original: 光さえも そらさないで
subtitles.english: Don't even look away from the light.

subtitles.original: 笑って 泣いて 君と出会えて
subtitles.english: Laughing, crying, having met you...

subtitles.original: 続く未来は 輝いていた
subtitles.english: The future that followed was shining.

subtitles.original: ひまわり揺れる 太陽の下で
subtitles.english: Under the sun where sunflowers sway,

subtitles.original: 私のまま 明日を
subtitles.english: As myself, into tomorrow...

subtitles.original: 「ありがとう」伝えたい 今なら言えるよ
subtitles.english: I want to say "thank you," I can say it now.

subtitles.original: 過ごした季節も 忘れはしないよ
subtitles.english: I won't forget the seasons we spent together.

subtitles.original: ひまわり揺れる 太陽のように
subtitles.english: Like the sunflowers swaying in the sun,

subtitles.original: 私の歌 君を 照らすよ
subtitles.english: My song will light your way.

subtitles.original: 私のまま
subtitles.english: As myself,

subtitles.original: 君を...
subtitles.english: You...

subtitles.original: 君を...
subtitles.english: You...

subtitles.original: 君を...
subtitles.english: You...

subtitles.original: ラララ...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: ラララ...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: ラララ...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: ラララ...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: ラララ...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: ラララ...
subtitles.english: La la la...

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Yay! Thank you so much for listening. That was Taiyou no Uta.
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you so much for listening. That was Taiyou no Uta.

subtitles.original: So for those who know, Taiyou no Uta is a very special song to me...
subtitles.english: So for those who know, Taiyou no Uta is a very special song to me...

subtitles.original: ...because that was the very first song that I've ever learned.
subtitles.english: ...because that was the very first song that I've ever learned.

subtitles.original: The very first song that I ever learned how to play, how to sing by myself in a music room.
subtitles.english: The very first song that I ever learned how to play, how to sing by myself in a music room.

subtitles.original: So I really hope you guys enjoyed it.
subtitles.english: So I really hope you guys enjoyed it.

subtitles.original: I'm getting emotional! Anyway, thank you so much. I hope you enjoyed it.
subtitles.english: I'm getting emotional! Anyway, thank you so much. I hope you enjoyed it.

subtitles.original: So, we're going to keep going!
subtitles.english: So, we're going to keep going!

subtitles.original: Next song is also a very, very, very special and fun song...
subtitles.english: Next song is also a very, very, very special and fun song...

subtitles.original: ...that I vowed I would perform one day, so I hope you guys enjoy.
subtitles.english: ...that I vowed I would perform one day, so I hope you guys enjoy.

subtitles.original: Are you ready for the next song?
subtitles.english: Are you ready for the next song?

subtitles.original: Third song: Ciki Ciki Bam Bam!
subtitles.english: Third song: Ciki Ciki Bam Bam!

subtitles.original: 猫も杓子も みんな気まぐれでツラい

subtitles.original: 呼べばテキーラ あらぬ妄想 続（ぞく）でピカ
subtitles.english: Calling out for Tequila, an ongoing delusion, sparkling

subtitles.original: 夢はパンドラ ほら開けたくなる

subtitles.original: みんな期待して Party Tonight
subtitles.english: Everyone's full of anticipation, Party Tonight

subtitles.original: 今夜フニャマ ノボロニャワカラナイ
subtitles.english: Tonight, Funyama Roboronya, I don't know

subtitles.english: Chan chan, Ai Ciki Ciki Bam Bam

subtitles.original: 愚か者ほど 背徳 ガズガズジャカ

subtitles.original: みんなスーパースターのタマゴさ Be With Tonight
subtitles.english: Everyone's a superstar egg, Be With Tonight

subtitles.original: Wow, such glamorous night!
subtitles.english: Wow, such glamorous night!

subtitles.original: でもも だけども みんな いらない Hands Up
subtitles.english: But even so, we don't need any of them, Hands Up

subtitles.original: Lili Neon Lili Night!
subtitles.english: Lili Neon Lili Night!

subtitles.original: Japanese Beauty 密かに 今 沸騰
subtitles.english: Japanese Beauty is secretly boiling now

subtitles.original: Bounce the Vibe! Let's Shout it out!

subtitles.english: If you drink, it goes on and on...
